attributes.action: Introuce and enforce the use of Curfews on the streets
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Prime Minister should enforce curfews on the children and young adults of today.Anyone up to the age of 17,or older if involved in any criminality,should be taken off the streets after 8pm of a night,and 6.30 pm in Winter time when the nights are dark.It's time to take the streets back off the kids and hand them to law abiding citizens.

rejection.details: Please supply full name and address information.
reasons: False or incomplete name or address information
